text: Frances Drake (née Frances Dean; October 22, 1912 – January 18, 2000) was an American actress. She played Sylvia in The Affairs of Martha in 1942. She also played Lola in I Take This Woman. Drake was born in New York City. She died in Irvine, California, aged 87. == Other websites == * Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from New York City Category:1912 births Category:2000 deaths
title: Frances Drake
